WaveEXCave.EXCave_Start_00: [Npc:Icon chara="LeafHermit"/][UE:Meta key="95c199e8fe2f4c9b90db830cf98cbc2a" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]그대의 계획력, 어디 한번 보여 주게나!
WaveEXCave.EXCave_Start_01: [Npc:Icon chara="LeafHermit"/][UE:Meta key="1031c9153ccb4fbb9012837f0bb7ef6d" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yes"/]어디, 실력 좀 볼까!
WaveEXCave.EXCave_Start_02: [Npc:Icon chara="LeafHermit"/][UE:Meta key="61d32e58d2e74041a359a5403d775c3f" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]허허허, 수행 시작이네!
WaveEXCave.EXCave_Start_03: [Npc:Icon chara="LeafHermit"/][UE:Meta key="9dbda1a7f71d4784a62e3e3207303822" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]이번부터 보상은 [System:Color name="Emphasis" ]하양피크민[System:Color name="Default"]으로 주겠네!
WaveEXCave.EXCave_Start_04: [Npc:Icon chara="LeafHermit"/][UE:Meta key="29446c679fac466aa81b24c31d6f4160" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yes"/]보상은 [System:Color name="Emphasis" ]보라피크민[System:Color name="Default"]이니, 열심히 해 보게나!
WaveEXCave.EXCave_LastOneMin_00: [Npc:Icon chara="LeafHermit"/][UE:Meta key="a8619b74eaba44a09ba00225b17aa10b" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]이제 곧 제한 시간이네!
WaveEXCave.EXCave_Enliven_00:
[Npc:Icon chara="LeafHermit"/][UE:Meta key="f0bd15f8189d4633a158e491645840cc" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yes"/]계획력을 발휘하고 싶다면～
'적재적소'라는 말을 늘 생각하게나～
WaveEXCave.EXCave_Enliven_01: [Npc:Icon chara="LeafHermit"/][UE:Meta key="862b6af7c84e4adab3fa04a531c7451f" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Think"/]순서를 잘～ 생각하는 것도～ 계획력의 일부이니라～
WaveEXCave.EXCave_Enliven_02: [Npc:Icon chara="LeafHermit"/][UE:Meta key="00072fc1aabc4c85ba3f6d1ffdc18008" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]지도도 잘 살펴보게나!
WaveEXCave.EXCave_Enliven_04: [Npc:Icon chara="LeafHermit"/][UE:Meta key="87ddf11a271f4e9fb3e96af5b0b7fe43" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]허허허, 내 젊은 시절을 보는 것 같구먼!
WaveEXCave.EXCave_Enliven_05: [Npc:Icon chara="LeafHermit"/][UE:Meta key="129f46d82163496188fc7c20ab4c5bf5" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Angry"/]멍하니 있을 틈이 어디 있나!
WaveEXCave.EXCave_GetItem_00: [Npc:Icon chara="LeafHermit"/][UE:Meta key="6d59c8f4191f4a7fadd2e8951fae0ac7" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Angry"/]주운 물건을 잘 활용하는 것![etc:Wait frame="8"/] 그것이 계획력이니라!
WaveEXCave.EXCave_GetItem_01: [Npc:Icon chara="LeafHermit"/][UE:Meta key="d0bbe671f7fa40b89d49b27d53306d89" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]허허허, 좋을 대로 써 보게나!
WaveEXCave.EXCave_SeijinDown_00:
[Npc:Icon chara="LeafHermit"/][UE:Meta key="5df7c7ce8fee48998a23a16952b867c7" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Question"/]뭣이? 칠칠치 못하구먼⋯
[Npc:Motion name="Yare"/][Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Happy"/]와치[Npc:EmphasisEnd/]더러 일으켜 주라고 해야겠어⋯
WaveEXCave.EXCave_SeijinDown_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="LeafHermit"/][UE:Meta key="f0a09588ae784b1f8c3ff619f60cb1ce" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]무리는 하지 말게!
[Npc:Motion name="Yare"/][Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Happy"/]와치[Npc:EmphasisEnd/]에게 일으켜 달라고 하게나!
WaveEXCave.EXCave_DogDown_00:
[Npc:Icon chara="LeafHermit"/][UE:Meta key="d88d8d47330f46cc9081acdcd9878c20" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Sad"/][Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Happy"/]와치[Npc:EmphasisEnd/]가 쓰러져 버렸구먼⋯
[Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]와치를 일으켜 줘야겠지!
WaveEXCave.EXCave_DogDown_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="LeafHermit"/][UE:Meta key="c4de0f4569ca4023b718d473fe8abdc4" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Angry"/][Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Happy"/]와치[Npc:EmphasisEnd/]에게 너무 무리를 시켰구먼!
[Npc:Motion name="Yare"/]잘 돌봐 줘야 하지 않겠는가⋯
WaveEXCave.EXCave_Disappearance_00:
[Npc:Icon chara="LeafHermit"/][UE:Meta key="2794b9da60af4bb1a04b7b664ccc77ca" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Angry"/]피크민이 전멸해 버렸잖나!
[Npc:Motion name="Question"/][System:Color name="Emphasis" ]다시 시작[System:Color name="Default"]하는 게 좋지 않겠나?
WaveEXCave.EXCave_Disappearance_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="LeafHermit"/][UE:Meta key="65c9357bbe2241aaa783425d168fb415" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Think"/]피크민이 없는 것 같은데⋯
[Npc:Motion name="Yare"/]그래도 계속할 생각인가?
WaveEXCave.EXCave_GetCloser_00: [Npc:Icon chara="LeafHermit"/][UE:Meta key="6b22f861c7d74afda96499ed8bee73c2" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yes"/]허허허, 열심히 옮겨 보게나!
WaveEXCave.EXCave_GetCloser_Object_00: [Npc:Icon chara="LeafHermit"/][UE:Meta key="b324701301664a1a97236f8fb0156c55" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]허허허, 자재를 모아 오는 게야!
WaveEXCave.EXCave_GetCloser_Object_01: [Npc:Icon chara="LeafHermit"/][UE:Meta key="580d6ed478e74995be306b0b6cc1da94" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]보물을 모으지 않으면 문은 열리지 않는다네!
WaveEXCave.EXCave_StrategyTips_00: [Npc:Icon chara="LeafHermit"/][UE:Meta key="b93f13ddf6e0474da767fa8a5072c13d" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Think"/]어디어디⋯ 어떻게 그 문을 여는지 한번 볼까!
WaveEXCave.EXCave_StrategyTips_01: [Npc:Icon chara="LeafHermit"/][UE:Meta key="c18dd1b6eed6437ca0904031a502a880" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]허허허, [System:Color name="Emphasis" ]보물을 3개[System:Color name="Default"] 모아 오게나!
WaveEXCave.EXCave_StrategyTips_02: [Npc:Icon chara="LeafHermit"/][UE:Meta key="c7d3da0d24464560b9290edfa60177f6" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yes"/]허허허, 원주생물도 이용해야겠지!
WaveEXCave.EXCave_StrategyTips_03: [Npc:Icon chara="LeafHermit"/][UE:Meta key="89938bc354e540f0ac62f095a5289afd" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Think"/]자아⋯ 과연 언제 방향을 바꿀 텐가?
WaveEXCave.EXCave_ProgressRateLow_00_01: [Npc:Icon chara="LeafHermit"/][UE:Meta key="faae8f9ffa2a4ba9aeb39e75557486dd" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yes"/]사냥감은 운반하지 않아도 된다네!
WaveEXCave.EXCave_ProgressRateLow_00_02: [Npc:Icon chara="LeafHermit"/][UE:Meta key="5a33c29b23f54de79662d604bf5bd636" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]어디부터 쓰러뜨릴지가 중요하지!
WaveEXCave.EXCave_ProgressRateLow_01_01: [Npc:Icon chara="LeafHermit"/][UE:Meta key="6e60b3173bb1496aad9e4a52451ef024" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yes"/]피크민이 얼지 않게 조심하게나!
WaveEXCave.EXCave_ProgressRateLow_01_02: [Npc:Icon chara="LeafHermit"/][UE:Meta key="0fc7a445af654f0ea65a816a018bbd60" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]허허허, 불씨를 잘 이용해야 하네!
WaveEXCave.EXCave_ProgressRateLow_02_01: [Npc:Icon chara="LeafHermit"/][UE:Meta key="e991fffa01c349819c9ba1cde61ac873" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yes"/]피크민에게 역할을 잘 나눠줘야 한다네!
WaveEXCave.EXCave_ProgressRateLow_02_02: [Npc:Icon chara="LeafHermit"/][UE:Meta key="4066162773a8402eaa1a7b61b0d2e360" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]쓸데없는 싸움은 피하는 것도 계획력의 일부라네!
WaveEXCave.EXCave_ProgressRateLow_03_01: [Npc:Icon chara="LeafHermit"/][UE:Meta key="50989d5f220d4145b657169aa6685ad0" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yes"/]날개피크민을 이용하면 운반 거리를 줄일 수 있지!
WaveEXCave.EXCave_ProgressRateLow_03_02: [Npc:Icon chara="LeafHermit"/][UE:Meta key="2680d6b5f0b84d62981ebf2b8c679f34" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]불맛 분무기를 어디서 사용할지가 중요하다네!
WaveEXCave.EXCave_ProgressRateLow_04_01: [Npc:Icon chara="LeafHermit"/][UE:Meta key="8f6f6f599ac24871b1c1939da3a270be" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yes"/]날개피크민으로 운반하면 지름길로 갈 수 있다네!
WaveEXCave.EXCave_ProgressRateLow_04_02: [Npc:Icon chara="LeafHermit"/][UE:Meta key="15b8983b2a174f5086a535b78c22846e" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]통통버섯을 이용해서 지름길로 가는 게야!
WaveEXCave.EXCave_ProgressRateLow_05_01: [Npc:Icon chara="LeafHermit"/][UE:Meta key="abc31d6d11544d8b83fe89a366365701" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/][System:Color name="Emphasis" ]장치를 잘 관찰[System:Color name="Default"]해 보게나!
WaveEXCave.EXCave_ProgressRateLow_05_02: [Npc:Icon chara="LeafHermit"/][UE:Meta key="6d06678d734244fa94576280d6b958b1" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Question"/]과연 그대는 이 장치를 풀 수 있을까?
WaveEXCave.EXCave_ProgressRateLow_06_01: [Npc:Icon chara="LeafHermit"/][UE:Meta key="7577445c285c4901b8709dfbed905f6f" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]허허허, 벼룩이 방해되는구먼!
WaveEXCave.EXCave_ProgressRateLow_06_02: [Npc:Icon chara="LeafHermit"/][UE:Meta key="720820c61d3a4dd99d7e5c7e73b6925d" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yes"/][Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Happy"/]와치[Npc:EmphasisEnd/]에게 지시를 내리는 것도 잊지 말게나!
WaveEXCave.EXCave_ProgressRateLow_07_01: [Npc:Icon chara="LeafHermit"/][UE:Meta key="092d4489ae4e4f178aabc66e6bdb3106" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Think"/][Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Happy"/]와치[Npc:EmphasisEnd/]와의 역할 분담이 중요하다네!
WaveEXCave.EXCave_ProgressRateLow_07_02: [Npc:Icon chara="LeafHermit"/][UE:Meta key="180ed5e232774a938c4909b107c79366" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yes"/]하양과 보라를 잘 나눠 쓰게나!
WaveEXCave.EXCave_ProgressRateLow_08_01: [Npc:Icon chara="LeafHermit"/][UE:Meta key="8fa75746e95b40b28dd97806d618731e" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]허허허, 어느 원주생물도 만만치 않지?
WaveEXCave.EXCave_ProgressRateLow_08_02: [Npc:Icon chara="LeafHermit"/][UE:Meta key="49cf1ab9310c42d2a0cb4f620f4a2b9c" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Think"/]언제 보라피크민을 사용할지가 중요하다네!
WaveEXCave.EXCave_ProgressRateLow_09_01: [Npc:Icon chara="LeafHermit"/][UE:Meta key="b2ba5f0c83064fe59ecc9c271b5e28e3" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Angry"/][System:Color name="Emphasis" ]하지 않아도 되는 일[System:Color name="Default"]을 잘 구별해야 하네!
WaveEXCave.EXCave_ProgressRateLow_09_02: [Npc:Icon chara="LeafHermit"/][UE:Meta key="b85112bcb603459b855e5ba5931888e6" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yes"/][Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Happy"/]와치[Npc:EmphasisEnd/]와의 협력이 꼭 필요하지!
WaveEXCave.EXCave_Happy_GuruGuru: [Npc:Icon chara="LeafHermit"/][UE:Meta key="5516eed58e2b4ad18215219f4e4ba518" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]허허허, [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Happy"/]와치[Npc:EmphasisEnd/]가 곤란해하는구먼!
WaveEXCave.EXCave_Happy_GuruGuru_Carry: [Npc:Icon chara="LeafHermit"/][UE:Meta key="f3cd2bfd2c6f492eaa770a62f6dfc9a8" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yare"/]에이, [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Happy"/]와치[Npc:EmphasisEnd/]야! 그쪽으론 못 옮긴다!
WaveEXCave.EXCave_Pikmin_GuruGuru: [Npc:Icon chara="LeafHermit"/][UE:Meta key="be5aac63cab14a1e98d54c192ff5f7a0" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Angry"/]이놈! 피크민을 제대로 이끌어 주지 못할까!
WaveEXCave.EXCave_Avatar_GuruGuru: [Npc:Icon chara="LeafHermit"/][UE:Meta key="6cc170a01af4464ab42a99aac330bf98" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yare"/]그대가 갈팡질팡해서 어쩔 셈인가!
WaveEXCave.EXCave_Avatar_GuruGuru_Carry: [Npc:Icon chara="LeafHermit"/][UE:Meta key="44e7826a190c4ef3b109aec23011bd78" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]이런이런, 그쪽으로는 옮길 수 없다네!
